page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY EXPERIENCE
page.content: "I have learned a lot about my town and the people in it." "I've never done anything quite so special." "I think that Domesday has made us all grow older." "It was great being a 'square searcher' and writing about things you have never seen or heard of before." "Domesday made us expert map- readers." "The fun bit was going out and interviewing,and meeting new people." "I have never known people to be so kind, and to give time to help us." "I think that Domesday is something that will tell people about our lives 900 years later.We have read about people who lived 900 years ago:they led hard and troublesome lives.We do too- sometimes."
